import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a funding source"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/funding-sources/{FundingSourceId}/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single funding source by ID. Use this to retire a funding source that should no longer be selectable in budgeting workflows.

**Prerequisites**
1. **FundingSourceId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) to locate the record and extract `Items[].FundingSourceId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the funding source to confirm the correct record.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}/delete](/docs/api/funding-sources/delete-funding-source) to remove it.
3. Optionally re-query to ensure the record is gone.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `FundingSourceId` (path).

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FundingSourceId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the funding source to delete","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
